Especially when they require to install nodejs and all dependencies to run a trivial server and rudimentary ui. In our corporate firewall all node packages are blocked and even if its possible to download some of them from corporate proxy there are lot of them which are blocked due to open vulnerabilities. So I decided to build this little server, and I can ask someone to just copy paste this code and along with it some actual functionality to run locally. My usecase is to run mock apis, and some log parser server which has ui and backend.
